text: Richard Boro (born 20 November 1996) is a Togolese professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ivorian club FC San Pédro. ==Career== In January 2018, Boro moved to Wadi Degla SC in Egypt from Dynamic Togolais, signing a two and a half year contract. The following January, he signed with Tala'ea El Gaish SC, also in Egypt. He made his international debut for Togo in a friendly match against Egypt in March 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Togolese footballers Category:Togolese expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Dynamic Togolais players Category:Wadi Degla SC players Category:Tala'ea El Gaish SC players Category:Egyptian Premier League players Category:Togolese expatriate sportspeople in Ivory Coast Category:Expatriate footballers in Iraq Category:Expatriate footballers in Ivory Coast
title: Richard Boro
